articles.description: Litecoin’s price might peak in October 2025, but things in the short term also looked quite bullish.

articles.title: Euro Quoted Lower as Left-Wing Bloc Set to Win French Election - Bloomberg
articles.description: French bond futures slipped, the euro dipped and European stock futures were little changed as traders digested initial projections in France’s legislative elections that pointed to a surprise victory for the leftist alliance.
